summary: 12-year-old Mei grew up with her grandparents in the mountains, but now lives with her parents in the city. Her parents constantly fight and she ignored at home. Mei withdraws into her own world and imagination.
cast: Jiao Xu|Hui-Min Lin|Rene Liu|Harlem Yu|Kenneth Tsang|Janel Tsai|Gwei Lun-Mei|Chin-Hang Shih|Lieh Lee|Yu-Hsun Chen|Shih-han Huang|Laura Chiu
director: Director: Tom Lin (as Tom Shuyu Lin)
title: Xing kong
